Reviews.Title: “simply wonderful”

Reviews.Content: stay home friends behalf thank hotel management staff wonderful stay unique hotel liked particularly serene atmosphere suits eternal city friends walk satisfied services tell friends course stay visit rome

Reviews.Title: “great location”
Reviews.Author: beausmom1
Reviews.Content: property location close san pietro train station saint peters vatican museums dining options walk steep hill hotel accommodations spartan clean adequate meals hotel dining free wireless lobby staff friendly

Reviews.Title: “Review based on my stay as a 17 year old in 1973”
Reviews.Author: sanfranciscoconejo
Reviews.Content: havent italy 1973 17 europe months school students awesome stayed hotel meals hotel economical probably ten dollars day remember meals included huge plate pasta meat dish wine beer wine meal friends hit girls serving realized nuns training waste hotel close vatican hill lot walked nice exists love hill soon lots memories

Reviews.Title: “I loved this place”
Reviews.Author: Thorin_2
Reviews.Content: loved location price clean functional safe neighborhood hidden jem walking distance st peters cathedral placed top hill difficult unless taxi dont negative reviews drink machines mean stop spoiled walk block drink cold tap water spilling street frequent fountains realize loved rome stay casa tra noi
